name: Something Is In Your Closet
description:
You have always had a hard time sleeping at night. And it's just your luck that tonight you see SOMETHING moving in your closet. 

Maybe you should go back to sleep. But what's the harm in checking it out?

FEATURES :

  • 3 endings (neutral, bad, and good)
  • Vampire sleepovers!
  • Weird, slightly(?) erotic blood-sucking and yandere elements.
  • Cute and lazily drawn black vampire boy.

I chose not to include any depictions of blood drinking, but there is still drawings of blood/gore.
